CatDescriptText: Select 1967 NNPA Merit award categories, judges and awardees are: Promotions;  judged by Dr. Armistead S. Pride, 1st place - Alma A. Polk - New Pittsburgh Courier, 2nd place - Thomas Picou - Chicago Daily Defender     Best Feature;  judged by Roy L. Kohler, 1st place -  Carol Schmidt - Michigan Chronicle, 2nd place - Toki Shalk Johnson - New Pittsburgh Courier, 3rd place - Nat Tillman - Louisville Defender     Editorial Cartoon;  judged by C. J. Zaimes, 1st place - Sam Milai - New Pittsburgh Courier, 2nd place - J. Jackson - St. Louis Argus, 3rd place - Willbert Holloway - New Pittsburgh Courier
TitMainTitle: Display of posters of 1967 National Newspaper Publishers Association awardees in front of New Pittsburgh Courier building, 315 Carson Street, South Side
